name: InTheMix
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the mix radio
des: In The Mix is your station for variety. We do not burn out the top 40 like most other radio stations do. In The Mix gives you a good rotation of the current hits with a large collection of flashbacks from the 70's, 80's, and 90's. We also throw in the occasional 60's song too. Why not? So, if you are sick of the same top 40 hits being played one after another, you came to the right place. Because, WE HATE THAT!!!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
